question:
Which of the following can make contributions to electoral trusts?
1. An individual who is a citizen of India
2. A company which is registered in India
3. Any foreign entity whether incorporated in India or notÂ 
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The following can make contributions to electoral trusts in India: (1) An individual who is a citizen of India, (2) A company which is registered in India and (3) a firm or Hindu undivided family or an Association of persons or a body of individuals, resident in India. Whereas any foreign entity whether incorporated in India or not cannot make contributions to electoral trusts.
